name: Moto GP 1 HD - Control your automobile motorbike through the tough mountain trails.
name_original: Moto GP 1 HD - Control your automobile motorbike through the tough mountain trails.
description:
Do you have what it takes to be King of the Mountain?

This motorbike racing game will test your reflexes, timing and accuracy as your perfect your jumps to gain maximum speed. You'll need to keep an eye on the road ahead, as you navigate the hills and valleys in your quest to be the best.

But not only will you be competing against yourself, trying to get a better time each round...but there's an avalanche coming towards you as well. Each mistake you make, every jump you misjudge will bring the avalanche closer. Will you make it to the finish line safely?

The more wins you get under your belt, the more coin you'll have to spend. Upgrade your motorbike so that you can go further, faster.

Features
- Addictive gameplay
- Clever physics
- Challenge your friends in multiplayer mode, or via game centre
- Brilliant graphics
- Smooth gameplay
- Easy to learn, a challenge to master
